body_html:
As for the original bug report: what is our expected behaviour for the "My Team" button, considering one can be part of more than one team (past and present)?

Can we just remove it or add a "My Team(s)" item to the nav bar that leads to a filtered teams#index with only those teams I am part of?
body_text:
As for the original bug report: what is our expected behaviour for the "My Team" button, considering one can be part of more than one team (past and present)?
Can we just remove it or add a "My Team(s)" item to the nav bar that leads to a filtered teams#index with only those teams I am part of?
body:
As for the original bug report: what is our expected behaviour for the "My Team" button, considering one can be part of more than one team (past and present)?

Can we just remove it or add a "My Team(s)" item to the nav bar that leads to a filtered `teams#index` with only those teams I am part of?
